swords.name: Backhand Dagger
swords.lore: Stab your enemies from behind their back

swords.name: Backhand Longsword
swords.lore: Good luck concealing this behind your back!

swords.name: Shattered Slabsword
swords.lore: This sword hits like a brick!

swords.name: Moon Sickle
swords.lore: Slice through your opponents with the smoothness of the moon

swords.name: BONK™
swords.lore: BONK™ is a certified masterpiece - CEO of BONK™ Studios
